alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 16 at 7:11PM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. * WHERE...Oneida, Onondaga, and Madison counties, especially at higher elevations. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing fog will reduce visibilities in places. Black ice may develop on untreated roads as temperatures cool down.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Onondaga; Southern Oneida
